Detailed Description

a function describing the gravitational potential of a spherical mass

GravitationPotential c'tor given a definition set in R³ (as parameter space), a mass and a radius of a spherical mass

Parameters:

xmax maximal value in t
dx stepsize in t

ymax maximal value in u
dy stepsize in u
zmin minimal value in v
zmax maximal value in v
dz stepsize in v

_R Radius of the generating sphere
